name: Ugpin - Nootiverse of Madness
description:
THIS IS A PARODY GAME MADE FOR A GAME JAM AND WILL NOT BE SOLD NOR MONITIZED.

Ugpin rules over time. Ugpin has conquered worlds across the galaxy. While it seems Ugpin has it all, there is one domain he has not touched yet... THE MULTIVERSE.

Facing rejection from his fellow council of variants, our Ugpin is challenged to venture through the HQ of the Council, slay alternate versions of himself and face his biggest foe of all... HIS NO. 1 VARIANT.

Will our Ugpin become the number one variant and truly become the greatest ruler of the infinite cosmos?

Controls:

WS - Up/Down

AD - Rotate

Left Click/ Release - Fire

P - Pause

ALT F4/ L - To Quit/ Exit
